alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 4:55PM MDT until July 12 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL PUEBLO COUNTY... At 455 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 23 miles northeast of Walsenburg to 12 miles south of Blende, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of central Pueblo County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
